title: Stalking Ivory
description: On a photographic assignment in the northern territory of Mount Marsabit, Jade del Cameron and her friends, Beverly and Avery Dunbury, plan to capture the area's elephant population, but their trip is threatened when they stumble upon the mutilated remains of a man and four elephants, a cache of hidden rifles, and slave traders. 40,000 first printing.
author: Suzanne Arruda
